name: R4B-ResearchSubject-R5-ResearchSubject
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R4B ResearchSubject into FHIR R5

element.display: Physical entity which is the primary unit of interest in the study

target.display: Participant or object which is the recipient of investigative activities in a study
target.comment: R4B `ResearchSubject` maps as Equivalent to R5 `ResearchSubject`
R4B `ResearchSubject.consent` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `ResearchSubject.consent` - consent changed from scalar to array (max cardinality from 1 to *)
R4B `ResearchSubject.contained` maps as Equivalent to R5 `ResearchSubject.contained`
R4B `ResearchSubject.extension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `ResearchSubject.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R4B `extension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `extension`
R4B `ResearchSubject.id` maps as Equivalent to R5 `ResearchSubject.id`

element.display: Business Identifier for research subject in a study

target.display: Business Identifier for research subject in a study
target.comment: R4B `ResearchSubject.identifier` maps as Equivalent to R5 `ResearchSubject.identifier`

element.display: A set of rules under which this content was created

target.display: A set of rules under which this content was created
target.comment: R4B `ResearchSubject.implicitRules` maps as Equivalent to R5 `ResearchSubject.implicitRules`
R4B `ResearchSubject.language` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `ResearchSubject.language` - language made the binding required (from Preferred) for http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/all-languages|5.0.0
R4B `ResearchSubject.meta` maps as Equivalent to R5 `ResearchSubject.meta`

R4B `ResearchSubject.modifierExtension` maps as RelatedTo to R5 `ResearchSubject.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R4B `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as RelatedTo for R5 `modifierExtension`
R4B `ResearchSubject.period` maps as Equivalent to R5 `ResearchSubject.period`

element.display: candidate | eligible | follow-up | ineligible | not-registered | off-study | on-study | on-study-intervention | on-study-observation | pending-on-study | potential-candidate | screening | withdrawn

target.comment: R4B `ResearchSubject.status` maps as Equivalent to R5 `ResearchSubject.status` - status has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/research-subject-status|4.3.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/publication-status|5.0.0 (Equivalent)
R4B `ResearchSubject.study` maps as Equivalent to R5 `ResearchSubject.study`

element.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation

target.display: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation
target.comment: R4B `ResearchSubject.text` maps as Equivalent to R5 `ResearchSubject.text`
